abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Transport
            Rehabilitation Project is to assist the Government of Serbia
            in reducing cost and improving safety for road users
            through: a) improving the condition of selected road
            sections of the main and regional road network; b) improving
            the effectiveness of road maintenance through the
            introduction of performance-based contracting in two pilot
            regions; and c) introducing safe road design principles,
            road safety audits, and targeted improvement measures. The
            project restructuring is needed to extend the project
            closing date following a request from the Government of the
            Republic of Serbia received in a letter dated October 10,
            2011. With the restructuring, the project closing date will
            be extended from December 31, 2011 to June 15, 2012. The
            restructuring does not involve any other changes.
